title: Middle Mouse Drag Scroll is smoothing even though Camera Smoothing is turned off
body:
The camera smoothing was extreme at first but I managed to reduce it by reseting all option to default, but it is still very much there. Any time I move the camera by dragging it keeps moving for a while after I stop.

I'm playing on a Lenovo Y700 laptop with a GTX960, I5-6300HQ 2.3GHz and 8GB of  RAM.

replies.body:
I'm not sure what you mean exactly by smoothing, do you mean that it just continues to scroll even after you stop?  Let's try a hard reset of your config settings to see if a corrupt setting was getting in the way.

Log into the game client.
Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings. 

Let me know if it helps!
